H0.text: Pie graph is another way to best organize a list of the distances that five students ran in 10 minutes.

H1.text: A bar graph is another way to best organize the distances that five students ran in 10 minutes.

H2.text: A line graph is another way to best organize the data of the distances that five students ran in 10 minutes.

H3.text: A pictograph is another way to best organize a list of the distances that five students ran in 10 minutes.

A4.text: Bar graphs/charts provide a visual presentation of categorical data.

A5.text: In statistics, pictograms are charts in which icons represent numbers to make it more interesting and easier to understand.

A6.text: A key is often included to indicate what each icon represents.
